author: Emmet Smith
title: Trusty robot disinfects rooms to prevent humans from getting exposed to coronavirus
description: Researchers at Nanyang Technological University in Singapore built a robot that can aid in the coronavirus response by disinfecting surfaces very quickly. XDBOT is controlled remotely, which helps reduce the risk of exposing hospital cleaning staff to the vir…
content:
Researchers at Nanyang Technological University in Singapore built a robot that can aid in the coronavirus response by disinfecting surfaces very quickly.
XDBOT is controlled remotely, which helps reduce the risk of exposing hospital cleaning staff to the vi… [+3 chars]
